name: Deliveries Package Tracker Backup
summary: Learn about .ORRS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Deliveries Package Tracker allows you to input tracking codes or link your delivery service account information (such as your eBay, UPS, or Amazon account) to track in-transit packages. It stores package, delivery, and account information in databases. Optionally, you can choose to back up these databases at any time, by selecting Backup & restore.

Backing up your Deliveries Package Tracker data creates one or more ORRS files that are stored in a ZIP archive. You can use these files to restore your Deliveries Package Tracker data or transfer it across devices.

description: An ORRS file is a backup file created by oRRs Deliveries Package Tracker, an Android app that lets users track to-be-delivered packages. It contains an encrypted record of a user's in-progress deliveries and linked delivery service account information. Deliveries Package Tracker stores ORRS files in .ZIP archives, created when a user backs up their data.

instructions: You can import an ORRS file into oRRs Deliveries Package Tracker (Android) to restore the information it contains. To do so, use the Backup & restore option. Note that if your ORRS file was created by a different version of Deliveries Package Tracker, you may not be able to import it, as different versions of Deliveries Package Tracker use different database versions.
